subject: RE: [junit] use of setUp and tearDown
msgSnippet: ... Um, Cedric... that _is_ the current JUnit behaviour. JUnit treats errors and failures differently,  and the test runners show them up as different counts.
messageBody:
Cedric wrote:

> This is certainly an improvement over the current JUnit
> behavior, but I still find that:

Um, Cedric... that _is_ the current JUnit behaviour. JUnit
treats errors and failures differently, and the test
runners show them up as different counts. The only way they
are treated the same is that both errors and failures show
up as red in GUI-based test runners.

Robert.
